page.title: 14PADSTOW LIONS INTERNATIONAL
page.content: {Padstow and District Lions Club}is 12 years old and has 24 members.All the members live in the area and come from all walks of life,including builders, shopkeepers,cafe owners,a teacher, traffic warden,electrician,fisherman, undertaker and estate agent.The main fund-raising events are{barbecues}with sky-diving parachutes,stalls and disco at The Well Parc Hotel,Trevone,and{a {Teddy Bear Stall}at Padstow harbour, where members sell tickets for 10p and people can win cuddly toys.The Club raises about Â£3,000 every year and as well as sending donations to National and International causes it also helps many local charitable cases, for example, last year the Club bought a{ {heart-monitoring machine}for the local ambulance as well as the{computer}on which the school has completed the{ {Domesday Project. }
